title: Welcome to the Kanium Discord!
description: Please ensure to read and understand the #info_and_rules channel, so that you may have some idea about who we are and how this place works.
Also, being on our Discord and playing games with us does Not require Kanium membership. In fact, applying for membership is something we prefer that people hold off on
Don't mistake our cautioning as unfriendliness, we are fun-loving weirdos that want new fun-loving weirdo-friends! We do, however, expect those that seek to apply for membership
show earnestness in the submitted application as well as in becoming part of the community.

fields.name: Description
fields.value: If you are certain about joining, use this command to do so

fields.name: (shit) Example
fields.value: !apply Hello, I am Dave and I would like to apply for Kanium for the following reasons...

fields.name: Enjoy your stay!
fields.value: With that out of the way, please feel free to hang out and be excellent to those around you. If you're looking to play a specific game, then simply look for that game's chat channel.

footer.text: If you have any questions, please ping a @Recruiter
